nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Blood God Crest\",\"color\":\"white\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Tracks a counter for each mob\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"killed while worn.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Gain \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"+1❁ Strength \",\"color\":\"red\"},{\"text\":\"for each digit\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"on the counter. \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"(Max 7)\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Counter: \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"None yet!\",\"color\":\"red\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"COMMON ACCESSORY\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"BLOOD_GOD_CREST"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{},"minecraft:profile":{"properties":{"textures":[{"value":""}]},"name":"textures"}}}
